alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 4:29PM CDT until April 13 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL NATCHITOCHES AND NORTHEASTERN SABINE PARISHES... At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of Many, or 15 miles west of Natchitoches, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Many, Zwolle, Allen, Pleasant Hill, Provencal, Robeline, Powhatan, Belmont, Marthaville, Hagewood and Flora. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
